name: The Mechanic
description: Statham stars as Arthur Bishop, a professional assassin who specializes in making his hits look like accidents, suicides, or the acts of petty criminals.

name: Three Billboards Outside Ebbing, Missouri
description: A mother personally challenges the local authorities to solve her daughter's murder when they fail to catch the culprit.

name: The Matrix
description: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

name: Interstellar
description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

name: The Expendables
description: A CIA operative hires a team of mercenaries to eliminate a Latin dictator and a renegade CIA agent.

name: Once Upon a Time in Hollywood
description: A faded television actor (Leonardo DiCaprio) and his longtime stunt double (Brad Pitt) strive to achieve fame and success in the film industry during the final years of Hollywood's Golden Age in 1969 Los Angeles.

name: Ford v Ferrari
description: American car designer Carroll Shelby and driver Ken Miles battle corporate interference, the laws of physics and their own personal demons to build a revolutionary race car for Ford and challenge Ferrari at the 24 Hours of Le Mans in 1966.

name: Joker
description: In Gotham City, mentally troubled comedian Arthur Fleck is disregarded and mistreated by society. He then embarks on a downward spiral of revolution and bloody crime. This path brings him face-to-face with his alter-ego: the Joker.

name: Bad Boys for Life
description: The Bad Boys Mike Lowrey and Marcus Burnett are back together for one last ride in the highly anticipated Bad Boys for Life.

name: John Wick: Chapter 3 - Parabellum
description: John Wick is on the run after killing a member of the international assassins' guild, and with a $14 million price tag on his head, he is the target of hit men and women everywhere.
